mapper.select: select * from boardtextinfo order by board_create_at DESC;

WITH textinfo AS ( SELECT board_id, board_type, board_title, board_content, board_create_at, board_recommend_count,user_id, user_nickname FROM boardtextinfo) , commentinfo AS ( SELECT board_id, board_type, COUNT(comment_id) AS comment_count FROM boardcomment GROUP BY board_id) SELECT t.*, c.comment_count FROM textinfo t LEFT JOIN commentinfo c ON (t.board_id = c.board_id AND t.board_type = c.board_type) WHERE t.board_type = #{boardType} order by t.board_create_at DESC
mapper.insert: insert into boardtextinfo (board_id, board_type, board_title, board_content, board_create_at, board_update_at, user_id, username, user_nickname) values (#{boardId}, #{boardType}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardCreateAt}, #{boardUpdateAt}, #{userId}, #{username}, #{userNickname});
mapper.delete: delete from boardtextinfo where board_id = #{boardId} and user_id = #{userId};
mapper.update: update boardtextinfo set board_recommend_count = boardtextinfo.board_recommend_count + 1 where board_id = #{boardId};
update boardtextinfo set board_recommend_count = boardtextinfo.board_recommend_count - 1 where board_id = #{boardId};
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY board.board_type ORDER BY board.board_recommend_count DESC) AS bt FROM boardtextinfo AS board ) AS rankrow WHERE rankrow.bt <= 5;
